notesStmt.note: The remnants of the first column contain Leviticus XVI 3 בזאת - XVI 14 באצבעו;column 2 contains XVI 21חטאתם - XVI 32 ולבש את; column 3 contains XVII 10 הדם - XVIII 1 משה; small additional fragment from the first column is extant, from XVI 1-2; Parchment written on one side, probably from a Torah Scroll, although it lacks crowns and a full empty line divides between open parshiot. The entire width of two columns, and half of a third are extant.
